Name: Crème Brûlée Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with a dusting of cinnamon powder.
Review: OK, so there's no crust, but this does contain egg yolk, caramel, vanilla, sugar and cream. Due to the cinnamon, it even has a brown top.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2002 by Yannick Miseriaux at the Fifth Floor Bar, London, England.
